channel.title: Autojs on Nice API
channel.description: Recent content in Autojs on Nice API

item.title: UI
item.description: 切换布局 # "ui"; 界面1(); function 界面1(){ ui.layout( <vertical> <button id="ok" text="切换界面"/> </vertical> ); ui.ok.click(function(){ 界面2(); }); } function 界面2(){ ui.layout( <vertical> <button id="ok" text="点一下回去"/> </vertical> ); ui.ok.click(function(){ 界面1(); }); }
